---
id: list-workspaces-user
title: "List user workspaces"
description: "Lists all workspaces and organizations to which the user identified by the given `userId` belongs. This includes both workspaces where the user is a participant and organizations where the user is a member."
sidebar_label: "List user workspaces"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: platform-api//seqera-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List user workspaces"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/user/{userId}/workspaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Lists all workspaces and organizations to which the user identified by the given `userId` belongs. This includes both workspaces where the user is a participant and organizations where the user is a member.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
